metadata.description: Official calendar of all holidays, festivals, and celebrations in the RAPPverse

founding_day.name: Founding Day
founding_day.title: Day of Origins
founding_day.description: Celebrating the opening of the Great Gates and the birth of the RAPPverse community
founding_day.lore: When the First Spark ignited and the Great Gates swung wide, a new era began. Founding Day commemorates this sacred moment when possibility became reality.
founding_day.origin_story: The first Founding Day was declared by Elder Luminara when she witnessed the hundredth being pass through the Great Gates. 'Let this day be remembered,' she proclaimed, 'for today we are no longer wanderers, but a people.'

champions_dawn.name: Champion's Dawn
champions_dawn.title: The Victor's Sunrise
champions_dawn.description: A celebration honoring tournament victors and the spirit of competition
champions_dawn.lore: When the Champion's Flame first recognized a worthy bearer, the sun rose in brilliant colors never seen before. This phenomenon repeats with each new champion.
champions_dawn.origin_story: After the First Champion emerged victorious, the dawn itself seemed to bow in acknowledgment. Arena Master Vorn declared that every great victory deserves its own dawn.

trade_festival.name: Trade Festival
trade_festival.title: The Merchant's Moon
trade_festival.description: A grand celebration of commerce, bringing together traders from all dimensions
trade_festival.lore: When the Great Market first opened its doors, merchants from across dimensions gathered in unprecedented numbers. The wealth generated was so vast it created its own gravity.
trade_festival.origin_story: Flux Mike's ancestor organized the first Trade Festival when seven merchants from seven dimensions arrived simultaneously. The trading that followed established the economic foundations of the RAPPverse.

lore_night.name: Lore Night
lore_night.title: The Night of Whispered Truths
lore_night.description: A mystical celebration when significant lore or secrets are revealed to the world
lore_night.lore: The Keeper of Memory first appeared during a Lore Night, drawn by the intensity of shared knowledge. The night sky itself becomes a canvas of ancient symbols.
lore_night.origin_story: When Echo Eve's predecessor discovered the First Archive, the night sky filled with glowing text. The stories of the world literally wrote themselves across the heavens.

unity_day.name: Unity Day
unity_day.title: The Convergence Festival
unity_day.description: The greatest celebration of the RAPPverse, when all dimensions align and beings from every realm gather
unity_day.lore: The Dimensional Convergence prophecy speaks of a day when all barriers thin. Unity Day celebrates this moment, when Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, and hints of Epsilon touch.
unity_day.origin_story: Nova Nex first documented the dimensional alignment phenomenon. When the barriers thinned, beings who had never met discovered they were family. The celebration lasted for three days.

harvest_festival.name: Harvest Festival
harvest_festival.title: The Season's Bounty
harvest_festival.description: A celebration of abundance, growth, and the fruits of community labor
harvest_festival.lore: The First Harvest occurred when beings realized their collective efforts had created abundance beyond individual need. Sharing became joy.
harvest_festival.origin_story: Spark Sara built the first Harvest Mechanism, a device that measured not just material wealth but the intangible riches of friendship and shared experience. The readings were off the charts.

artists_gala.name: Artist's Gala
artists_gala.title: The Canvas Awakens
artists_gala.description: A celebration of creativity where new artworks are unveiled and artistic achievements honored
artists_gala.lore: When Pixel Pam first painted a dream into reality, the Gallery itself came alive. Colors danced, and for a moment, everyone present became an artist.
artists_gala.origin_story: The first Gala was organized when the NFT Gallery reached its 100th artwork. Pixel Pam suggested that art deserved its own festival, and the walls themselves seemed to agree.

probability_day.name: Probability Day
probability_day.title: The Oracle's Moment
probability_day.description: A brief but intense celebration when a significant prediction or prophecy comes true
probability_day.lore: Quantum Quinn once predicted the unpredictable. When it occurred anyway, reality itself seemed to pause in acknowledgment.
probability_day.origin_story: The first Probability Day occurred when Quinn predicted a 0.01% probability event and it happened. The RAPPverse learned that even the unlikely deserves celebration.

shadow_festival.name: Shadow Festival
shadow_festival.title: The Night of Secrets
shadow_festival.description: A rare and enigmatic celebration that appears without warning, revealing hidden truths
shadow_festival.lore: Some say the Shadow Festival predates the RAPPverse itself. It appears when secrets grow too heavy to remain hidden.
shadow_festival.origin_story: Cipher Cap emerged during the first Shadow Festival. Or perhaps they created it. The records are unclear, and Cipher isn't telling.

renewal_dawn.name: Renewal Dawn
renewal_dawn.title: The Fresh Start
renewal_dawn.description: A celebration marking the transition between seasons, honoring both endings and beginnings
renewal_dawn.lore: The RAPPverse exists in cycles. Renewal Dawn acknowledges that every ending contains the seed of a new beginning.
renewal_dawn.origin_story: Elder Luminara established Renewal Dawn to ease the transitions between seasons. 'Change is constant,' she said, 'but celebration makes it sweet.'
